synopsis.text: Matthew, a rabbit with a penchant for daydreaming and worrying, shares his home in an enchanted forest with two unlikely friends. Keron, a frog with a pessimistic outlook and a fondness for lucky charms, and Ham, a quiet hamster who lives life at his own leisurely pace, join Matthew on their daily adventures. Despite their small stature and lack of confidence, the trio finds joy and amusement in their everyday existence, proving that even the smallest creatures can lead fulfilling lives. This heartwarming comedy, Usagi no Matthew, invites you to join these endearing critters as they navigate the mysteries of their magical forest home.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
